title: Chatra
shortDescription: Live chat that helps to grow revenue and collect feedback.
longDescription: Chatra Live Chat allows you to sell more, answering questions and alleviating concerns to help visitors place an order. Use it to collect actionable feedback to improve your website: identify problems, collect contact info and understand your customers better. ## Distinctive Features ### Cart Saving Reduce cart abandonment rate, proactively contacting customers stuck on the check out. ### Real-time visitor list See who’s on your website and where are they from. Start chatting with any visitor. ### Live typing insights See what customers type before they hit “send”. Save time on preparing an answer. ### Group chats Make few agents talk to a customer in a group chat to solve pressing issues and delight with the level of service. ### Visitor information Know your customers once they start chatting with you – what page they are on, where are they from and what device and system they use to access your website. ![Visitor information](https://chatra.io/_i/_help/secret-knowledge.en.jpg) ### Conversation history We save past conversations for both you and your customers, so once they return the conversation continues in the same thread, as in a messenger app. ### Collects contact info Even when you are offline or unavailable, so that you can get back to customers even if they left your site. ### Targeted chats (triggers) Initiate conversations when certain criteria are met: target those customers who might be in need of assistance. ![Targeted chats](https://chatra.io/_i/_help/smart-action-front-page.en.jpg) ### Correct typos Correct answers after sending the message. ### Agent photos visible pre-chat After clicking on the widget, visitors can see photos and names of the online agents, even before they start chatting. This is highly engaging and can lift a number of quality chat interactions. ### Work from a browser, desktop or mobile apps Windows & Mac, Android & iOS. Even on the go we’ve got you covered! ![Work from a browser, desktop or mobile apps](https://chatra.io/_i/all-platforms-1.jpg) For the full feature list and additional information check [chatra.io](https://chatra.io/).
author: Roger Wilco LLC

proposedApp.title: Chatra
proposedApp.shortDescription: Live chat software that helps to increase revenue and collect feedback providing an easy way for website owners to talk to visitors in real time.
proposedApp.longDescription:
Chatra Live Chat allows you to sell more, answering questions and alleviating concerns to help visitors place an order. Use it to collect actionable feedback to improve your website: identify problems, collect contact info and understand your customers better.

**Distinctive Features:**

- **Cart Saving.** Reduce cart abandonment rate, proactively contacting customers stuck on the check out.
- **Real-time visitor list.** See who’s on your website and where are they from. Start chatting with any visitor.
- **Live typing insights.** See what customers type before they hit “send”. Save time on preparing an answer.
- **Group chats.** Make few agents talk to a customer in a group chat to solve pressing issues and delight with the level of service.
- **Visitor information.** Know your customers once they start chatting with you – what page they are on, where are they from and what device and system they use to access your website.
- **Conversation history.** We save past conversations for both you and your customers, so once they return the conversation continues in the same thread, as in a messenger app.
- **Collects contact info.** Even when you are offline or unavailable, so that you can get back to customers even if they left your site.
- **Targeted chats (triggers).** Initiate conversations when certain criteria are met: target those customers who might be in need of assistance.
- **Correct typos.** Correct answers after sending the message.
- **Looks & feels as a messenger app.** Smooth animations, avatars, beautiful design.
- **Agent photos visible pre-chat.** After clicking on the widget, visitors can see photos and names of the online agents, even before they start chatting. This is highly engaging and can lift a number of quality chat interactions.
- **Work from a browser, desktop or mobile apps.** Windows & Mac, Android & iOS. Even on the go we’ve got you covered!
- **Simple, straightforward pricing.** Free forever plan, or $15 per agent/month

For the full feature list and additional information check [chatra.io](https://chatra.io/).
proposedApp.author: Roger Wilco LLC

proposedApp.shortDescription: Live chat that helps to grow revenue and collect feedback.
proposedApp.longDescription: Chatra Live Chat allows you to sell more, answering questions and alleviating concerns to help visitors place an order. Use it to collect actionable feedback to improve your website: identify problems, collect contact info and understand your customers better. ## Distinctive Features ### Cart Saving Reduce cart abandonment rate, proactively contacting customers stuck on the check out. ### Real-time visitor list See who’s on your website and where are they from. Start chatting with any visitor. ### Live typing insights See what customers type before they hit “send”. Save time on preparing an answer. ### Group chats Make few agents talk to a customer in a group chat to solve pressing issues and delight with the level of service. ### Visitor information Know your customers once they start chatting with you – what page they are on, where are they from and what device and system they use to access your website. ![Visitor information](https://chatra.io/_i/_help/secret-knowledge.en.jpg) ### Conversation history We save past conversations for both you and your customers, so once they return the conversation continues in the same thread, as in a messenger app. ### Collects contact info Even when you are offline or unavailable, so that you can get back to customers even if they left your site. ### Targeted chats (triggers) Initiate conversations when certain criteria are met: target those customers who might be in need of assistance. ![Targeted chats](https://chatra.io/_i/_help/smart-action-front-page.en.jpg) ### Correct typos Correct answers after sending the message. ### Agent photos visible pre-chat After clicking on the widget, visitors can see photos and names of the online agents, even before they start chatting. This is highly engaging and can lift a number of quality chat interactions. ### Work from a browser, desktop or mobile apps Windows & Mac, Android & iOS. Even on the go we’ve got you covered! ![Work from a browser, desktop or mobile apps](https://chatra.io/_i/all-platforms-1.jpg) For the full feature list and additional information check [chatra.io](https://chatra.io/).
proposedApp.author: Roger Wilco LLC

accountTip.helpvalue: Showing demo Chatra account. Sign up or login to see more options and install Chatra on your website.

proposedApp.title: Chatra
proposedApp.shortDescription: Live chat that helps to grow revenue and collect feedback.
proposedApp.longDescription: Chatra Live Chat allows you to sell more, answering questions and alleviating concerns to help visitors place an order. Use it to collect actionable feedback to improve your website: identify problems, collect contact info and understand your customers better. ## Distinctive Features ### Cart Saving Reduce cart abandonment rate, proactively contacting customers stuck on the check out. ### Real-time visitor list See who’s on your website and where are they from. Start chatting with any visitor. ### Live typing insights See what customers type before they hit “send”. Save time on preparing an answer. ### Group chats Make few agents talk to a customer in a group chat to solve pressing issues and delight with the level of service. ### Visitor information Know your customers once they start chatting with you – what page they are on, where are they from and what device and system they use to access your website. ![Visitor information](https://chatra.io/_i/_help/secret-knowledge.en.jpg) ### Conversation history We save past conversations for both you and your customers, so once they return the conversation continues in the same thread, as in a messenger app. ### Collects contact info Even when you are offline or unavailable, so that you can get back to customers even if they left your site. ### Targeted chats (triggers) Initiate conversations when certain criteria are met: target those customers who might be in need of assistance. ![Targeted chats](https://chatra.io/_i/_help/smart-action-front-page.en.jpg) ### Correct typos Correct answers after sending the message. ### Agent photos visible pre-chat After clicking on the widget, visitors can see photos and names of the online agents, even before they start chatting. This is highly engaging and can lift a number of quality chat interactions. ### Work from a browser, desktop or mobile apps Windows & Mac, Android & iOS. Even on the go we’ve got you covered! ![Work from a browser, desktop or mobile apps](https://chatra.io/_i/all-platforms-1.jpg) For the full feature list and additional information check [chatra.io](https://chatra.io/).
